text: wlma raje musaa 'iilaa qawmih min bani 'iisrayiyl ghadban hzynana; li'ana allah qad akhbrh 'anah qad futin qwmh, wa'ana alsamry qad adllahm, qal mwsa: bis alkhilafat alty khalaftumuni min bedy, 'aeajiltum 'amr rbkm? ay: astejltm mjyyy 'iilaykum wahu mqddar min allah teala? wa'alqaa musaa 'alwah altawrat ghdba ealaa qawmih aladhin ebdu alejl, wghdbana ealaa 'akhih harwn, wamsk biras 'akhih yajuruh 'ilyh, qal harun mstetfana: ya abn amy: 'iina alqawm astdhlwny wedduny deyfana wqarbu 'ana yqtlwny, fala tasrr al'aeda' bima tafeal by, wala tajealni fi ghdbk mae alqawm aladhin khalfu amrk webdu alejl
